titleStmt.title: A modest confutation of a slanderous and scurrilous libell, entitvled, Animadversions vpon the remonstrants defense against Smectymnuus
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Joseph Hall. cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
